title: Chili Garlic Shrimp (Gambas Al Ajillo)
directions: Heat a cast-iron skillet on high heat. Add oil, garlic and chili flakes, stirring occasionally, until the garlic is golden. Add shrimp and salt to taste. Stirring until shrimp are completely cooked through. Stir in the parsley and serve immediately with some sliced French bread (optional).
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped Italian flat leaf parsley
crusty French bread for serving, optional
